title: Robert Cameron (Queen's Park footballer)
text:
Robert J. Cameron was a Scottish amateur <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="wing%20half">wing half</a> who played in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Queen%27s%20Park%20F.C.">Queen's Park</a>.
Personal life.
Cameron served in the <a href="Queen%27s%20Own%20Cameron%20Highlanders">Queen's Own Cameron Highlanders</a> during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a> and rose to the rank of <a href="lance%20corporal">lance corporal</a>.
